thread.title: На Красной площади состоится торжественное шествие в годовщину парада 7 ноября 1941 года
thread.title_full: На Красной площади состоится торжественное шествие в годовщину парада 7 ноября 1941 года

posts.author: Наталья Сельдемирова
posts.title: На Красной площади состоится торжественное шествие в годовщину парада 7 ноября 1941 года
posts.text:
09:42 07.11.2017 На Красной площади состоится торжественное шествие в годовщину парада 7 ноября 1941 года 
Меньше, чем через 30 минут в центре Москвы на Красной площади начнется торжественный марш в честь годовщины легендарного военного парада 1941 года. 76 лет назад, когда враг был на подступах к столице, с Красной площади бойцы отправлялись прямо на фронт. Сегодня, отдавая дань памяти о тех событиях, по брусчатке пройдет шествие кавалеристов Президентского полка, исторических рот, суворовцев и кадетов. Всего по Красной площади прошагают более пяти тысяч человек. В течение всего дня у стен Кремля можно будет увидеть технику военных лет. Уже традиционно из-за торжеств в некоторых районах перекрыт проезд для автомобилей. Подробнее об ограничениях расскажет служба трафика Авторадио. <>

thread.title: Niger Delta Minister updates Buhari on NDDC, ongoing projects,
thread.title_full: Niger Delta Minister updates Buhari on NDDC, ongoing projects,

posts.author: PM NEWS Live
posts.title: Niger Delta Minister updates Buhari on NDDC, ongoing projects,
posts.text:
Niger Delta Minister updates Buhari on NDDC, ongoing projects, 4 hours ago Politics Minister of Niger Delta Affairs, Mr Usani Uguru Usani 
The Minister of Niger Delta Affairs, Mr Usani Uguru Usani on Monday in Abuja updated President Muhammadu Buhari on the activities of his ministry. 
Speaking to State House correspondents, Usani said he updated Buhari on the current development at the Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC). 
“For a while, he has not been round and their things he needed to know from me. 
“So, I had to brief him on issues pertaining to the ministry, the projects that are going and other anthropogenic issues that have to do with the general matters concerning the Niger Delta region especially, at the throw up of some of the concerns bothering on who is right to speak for, who not right to speak for, and then the issues of the Niger Delta Development Commission. 
“All these occupied our discussion with the President today.’’ 
On the recent threat by Niger Delta Avengers to resume attacks on oil installations, the minister stated that the issue was not discussed during his meeting with the president. 
He, however, maintained that the Federal Government would continue to dialogue with all aggrieved groups in the Niger Delta region with a view to ensuring peace and stability in the country. 
“Well, we haven’t discussed the Avengers per se. But, the President has always shown indication that whatever we need to and can do to sustain peace in the region, we would continue to do it. 
“And of course, the benefit of that, you are aware that the Vice President has been chairing the committee that handles the issues they are raising. 
“And so, while that goes on operationally, the President just needs to be briefed on our efforts though we know that the Vice President is briefing him from time to time but per se, the Avengers issues was not discussed. 
“On a general note, it is understood that we have to be engaged to be able to sustain the peace that prevailed for a while,’’ he added. 
The minister described the slow pace of work on the East West road project as unfortunate. 
He said: “But we all have to appreciate one thing. Such physical infrastructure don’t decay over night and so the neglect has continually put continues liability on us. 
“Yes, it’s true that I met with the contractors, appealed to them to go back to site, we have also been very conscientious in releasing funds In this article

posts.title: Biletul Zilei Pariuri1x2.ro. Varianta de marţi, dominată...
posts.text:
Articol publicat in: Sport > Sporturi Biletul Zilei Pariuri1x2.ro. Varianta de marţi, dominată de tenis Publicat: (acum 16 ore) // Actualizat: (acum 16 ore) // Sursa: romaniatv.net 
Cei mai buni jucători de tenis sub 21 deani își dau întâlnire la Next Gen ATP Finals, întrecere ce se disputa în această săptămână la Milano. Extragem două pronosticuri din competiția amintită și completăm biletul zilei cu un pont simplu din fotbal. 
Biletul zilei 
Aceeași variantă, peste 3.5 seturi, o alegem pentru meciurile Shapovalov – Hyeon Chung și Khachanov – Medvedev. În ambele dispute de la Next Gen avem față în față jucători cu performanțe destul de modeste în ultima parte a sezonului competițional 2017. La Milano au șansa șansa revirimentului, dar și a unor câștiguri de top, în condițiile în care premiile totale ale turneului sunt de 1.27 milioane de dolari. 
Pe biletul gândit de redacția www.pariuri1x2.ro își face loc și un pont pe goluri. Derby-ul academiilor echipelor din Sheffield, United și Wednesday, este pregătit să propună cel puțin două modificări ale tabelei. Se anunță un meci disputat și prin prisma faptului că la mijloc este poziția de lider in Professional Development League, seria de nord. 
Khachanov – Medvedev peste 3.5 seturi 
Shapovalov – Hyeon Chung, peste 3.5 seturi 
Sheffield Wed. rezerve – Sheffield Utd. rezerve, peste 1.5 goluri 
Daca pariezi biletul zilei la aceasta casa de pariuri , atunci ai cea mai mare cota si in plus primesti si una dintre cele mai bune oferte de bun venit din Romania.

thread.title: Rynek mocy dla węgla do 2035 roku. Szkic kompromisu po myśli Polski - BiznesAlert.pl
thread.title_full: Rynek mocy dla węgla do 2035 roku. Szkic kompromisu po myśli Polski - BiznesAlert.pl

posts.title: Rynek mocy dla węgla do 2035 roku. Szkic kompromisu po myśli Polski - BiznesAlert.pl
posts.text:
Alert 7 listopada, 2017 godz. 9:30 REDAKCJA Rynek mocy dla węgla do 2035 roku. Szkic kompromisu po myśli Polski 
Jest szkic poprawek kompromisowych Komisji ITRE Parlamentu Europejskiego do rozporządzenia na temat modelu rynku energii ustalonych między innymi z polskim resortem energii. Zakłada on m.in. wydłużenie okresu obowiązywania rynku mocy dla elektrowni węglowych do 2035 roku. W zamian Polacy poszli na daleko idące ustępstwa. Rynek mocy dla węgla na dłużej 
Według deklaracji ministerstwa energii ustawa o rynku mocy ma zostać przyjęta do końca roku tak, aby mogła wejść w życie od 1 stycznia 2018 roku. Rynek mógłby wtedy zacząć funkcjonować w 2021 roku. Rynek mocy dla elektrowni węglowych miał pierwotnie funkcjonować w okresie przejściowym, czyli tylko do 2027 roku, ale polskim negocjatorom udało się wydłużyć jego obowiązywanie do 2035 roku. 
Mechanizm ma przekształcić rynek energii z jednotowarowego na dwutowarowy (dostępność oprócz energii). Dopłata wyszczególniona na rachunkach za dostawy energii finansowałaby dostępność mocy wytwórczych, które w normalnych warunkach rynkowych nie poradziłyby sobie, a zostały uznane za istotne dla polskiego bezpieczeństwa energetycznego. Chodzi głównie o elektrownie węglowe, które dają stabilne dostawy energii, ale są wysokoemisyjne. 
W ocenie skutków regulacji ustawy o rynku mocy podano, że przez dziesięć lat obowiązywania mechanizmu budżet zapłaci 10,38 mln złotych w latach 2017-2027, ale koszty dostawy energii spadną o około 55,6 mld złotych w latach 2021-2035. 
Równolegle na poziomie unijnym negocjowany jest pakiet zimowy, czyli szereg regulacji dla rynku energetycznego, zakłada zakaz pomocy publicznej dla źródeł energii z emisją powyżej 550 g CO2 na kWh. Gdyby został przyjęty przed kompromisem w sprawie rynku mocy, mógłby wykluczyć wsparcie dla energetyki węglowej. 
WysokieNapiecie.pl: Ustępstwa Polaków za rynek mocy dla węgla 
W zamian za wydłużenie okresu dostępności rynku mocy dla elektrowni węglowych Polacy poszli na daleko idące ustępstwa opisane przez WysokieNapiecie.pl. Chodzi o kontrakty na rynek mocy dłuższe niż dwa lata. Otrzymają je tylko jednostki emitujące poniżej 450 g CO2/kWh. Najdłuższe kontrakty mają obowiązywać od 15 lat. Kolejne ustępstwo to zgoda na uwzględnienie w mechanizmie interkonektorów przed 2021 rokiem i zagranicznych elektrowni w mechanizmie po tej cezurze. To także skrócenie czasu udostępnienia mocy z 15 do 4 godzin, co premiuje elektrownie szczytowo-pompowe i magazyny energii. 
Szkic to owoc długich negocjacji z udziałem polskiego ministerstwa energii, które było w stałym kontakcie z Parlamentem Europejskim. 
Wojciech Jakóbik

thread.title_full: Benefits Of Private Nurses Los Gatos

posts.author: choukraoui elhassane (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Benefits Of Private Nurses Los Gatos
posts.text:
By Virginia Powell 

Patients with extreme and long ailments can get better assistance from a private medical practitioner who is specialized in home care. As opposed to reoccurring and costly hospital inpatient visits, home care experts offer a productive and inspiring chance to recover. The financial burden is also decreased by a huge margin. When you need private nurses Los Gatos is a lovely place to find services.

There are various ways in which a nurse offers support for a patient who is staying at home. The first is medical support. Good healthcare is not limited to hospitals only. Professionals can take their skills and experience to home care. A patient will get good personalized care and avoid the struggle of getting to hospitals. All you need is to hire an expert who is licensed and available for day to day care as well as emergencies.

Home care providers likewise offer support emotionally. With an ill relative at home there are many confounding feelings from the family members as well. It is better to have an expert nearby to comfort both the family and the patient. Specialists have presumably been involved in numerous comparative circumstances and they can give essential emotional support. You will dependably have somebody to hear you out and offer a shoulder.

A home nurse is not only suited for medical conditions that are short term but also long and chronic ones. There are nurses that specialize in conditions such as dementia, Parkinsons disease and disabilities among others. Such specialists will help everyone to cope through therapy.

A decent medical attendant will treat the underlying issues related with the incessant sicknesses and afterward continue to offer counselling for both family and patient. The procedures are meant to help everyone adapt over the long haul. Through the agonizing circumstances your nurse will reassure and console you.

The job of a private nurse extends beyond the obvious responsibilities. When the emotional and medical support is merged with therapy the effect on the lives of patients as well as the families is tremendous. The intense and humane option provides another option to the disappointment and stress many tragically find in traditional nursing homes.

Most patients feel loved and comfortable at home. When you bring a therapeutic expert to their homes then you offer the most ideal care. It is easy to locate a trustworthy nurse for home care services. Through the web you will find the best experts in your town. There are numerous specialists who promote their administrations on the web. You likewise get the chance to peruse reviews for any criticism on any particular administration.

You can refer to online registries to find the best experts. There are many organizations who have very experienced staff that will guarantee you an experience like no other. It is advisable to set up a face to face meeting with potential service providers before hiring them. You should also confirm that your insurance company will foot bills that are accrued when you get home care for a patient.




About the Author:

You can find a summary of the reasons why you should hire private nurses Los Gatos area at http://www.privatenursesolutions.com right now.

thread.title: Τι εισφορές θα πληρώνουν όσοι αμείβονται με απόδειξη δαπάνης
thread.title_full: Τι εισφορές θα πληρώνουν όσοι αμείβονται με απόδειξη δαπάνης

posts.author: jupiterbilly (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Τι εισφορές θα πληρώνουν όσοι αμείβονται με απόδειξη δαπάνης
posts.text: Τι εισφορές θα πληρώνουν όσοι αμείβονται με απόδειξη δαπάνης Εισφορές ύψους 26,95% προς τον ΕΦΚΑ , για κύρια ασφάλιση και υγεία, υποχρεούνται να καταβάλλουν από το νέο έτος επαγγελματίες που λαμβάνουν αμοιβή με απόδειξη δαπάνης (τίτλο κτήσης). Οι εισφορές αυτές θα προστεθούν στον φόρο ύψους 20% με τον οποίο επιβαρύνονται ήδη οι επαγγελματίες, με αποτέλεσμα το κράτος να εισπράττει -με τον έναν ή με τον άλλο τρόπο- το 47% της αμοιβής τους. Σύμφωνα με διάταξη νόμου που καταρτίζει το υπουργείο Εργασίας, σε όλες τις αμοιβές με απόδειξη δαπάνης θα καταβάλλεται εισφορά 20% υπέρ ΕΦΚΑ και 6,95% υπέρ ΕΟΠΥΥ (η οποία εισπράττεται από τον ΕΦΚΑ). Μάλιστα οι εισφορές του 26,95% θα παρακρατούνται από τους ίδιους του εργαζόμενους και δεν θα επιβαρύνουν τον εργοδότη. Δηλαδή θα αφαιρούνται από την αμοιβή του προσώπου που θα λαμβάνει τον τίτλο κτήσης, θα κατατίθενται όμως στον ΕΦΚΑ από τον αντισυμβαλλόμενο - εργοδότη. Όπως αναφέρουν στελέχη της κοινωνικής ασφάλισης, οι εισφορές που θα επιβαρύνουν τους τίτλους κτήσης θα είναι ανάλογες με εκείνες που έχουν ήδη θεσμοθετηθεί για τους μη μισθωτούς ασφαλισμένους (δηλαδή 20% για κύρια σύνταξη και 6,95% για ιατροφαρμακευτική περίθαλψη). Υπενθυμίζεται πως στην περίπτωση που τελικά το «χαράτσι» επιβληθεί από το νέο έτος, τότε οι αποδείξεις δαπάνης που θα εκδοθούν τη φετινή χρονιά, αλλά και όλες που εκδόθηκαν κατά τα προηγούμενα έτη, θα αποφύγουν την επιβολή των νέων ασφαλιστικών εισφορών. Η αμοιβή με απόδειξη δαπάνης υπήρξε ένα θολό πεδίο επαγγελματικής δραστηριοποίησης μέχρι σήμερα. Για παράδειγμα η ΕΛΣΤΑΤ που απασχολεί ανά τακτά χρονικά διαστήματα εργαζόμενους για τη συλλογή στατιστικού υλικού, καλύπτουν πάγιες ανάγκες αλλά από την υπηρεσία τους θεωρούνται ιδιώτες συνεργάτες. Μέχρι πρόσφατα λοιπόν δεν είχαν πληρωθεί τα δεδουλευμένα του 2017 και εργάζονταν ανασφάλιστοι, διότι η υπηρεσία τους υποστήριζε ότι πληρώνονταν με αποδείξεις δαπανών και άρα οι ίδιοι πρέπει (εξ ολοκλήρου) να βαρύνονται με την καταβολή των ασφαλιστικών εισφορών.

thread.title: Россияне стали больше интересоваться курсом доллара к рублю - опрос
thread.title_full: Россияне стали больше интересоваться курсом доллара к рублю - опрос

posts.author: Наталья Сельдемирова
posts.title: Россияне стали больше интересоваться курсом доллара к рублю - опрос
posts.text:
09:31 07.11.2017 Россияне стали больше интересоваться курсом доллара к рублю - опрос 
Россияне стали интересоваться курсом доллара к рублю больше, чем два года назад, следует из опроса ВЦИОМ. Около 65% респондентов хранят деньги в рублях, лишь 5% имеют сбережения в долларах, еще 4% - в евро, в других валютах - 1%. Около 32% опрошенных признались, что у них нет сбережений. Отмечается, что в 2015 и 2016 годах об отсутствии сбережений заявляли 43% и 39% соответственно, а в 2009 году - 66%. <>

thread.title: DNEVNA DOZA LUNE -7.11.2017.
thread.title_full: DNEVNA DOZA LUNE -7.11.2017.

posts.author: Natasa Paunovski (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: DNEVNA DOZA LUNE -7.11.2017.
posts.text:
Foto /  virulentignis.tumbir.com 
Skrivanje od vetra u udobnu i sigurnu pećinu kao pripremu pred zimu.Luna je stavila krunu i spremna je za nove pobede.Bacanje maski i novi izazovi.Zbogom foliražama, Luna ima preča posla.Tačka.Kriminalistika i istraživanje istorije.Ništa ne može kupiti sreću, samo ljubav i vera.Jaka migrena koja ne prestaje već dva dana intezivno.Lekovi nemaju efekat već psiha i manje zadovoljstva ovih dana.Disanje punim plućima i padanje suza pod beogradskom košavom.Dvoumljenja o razmišljanjima o daljim planovima.Dvoumljenja i vaganja u ljubavi, Mark Tven je rekao:" Kad se dvoumis, reci istinu", nekako je lakše svima.Traženje balansa i analiziranje.Potreba za nečim novim, svežim, iskrenijim doneće nagli osmeh i odkucaje jačih impulsa srca i deteta iznutra koje je željno pažnje..Poverljivi razgovori, isti uvek nadju iste i po Luni i po srcu.Virtuelni poljubci i zagrljaji greju dosadnu pasivnu jesenju melanholiju.Stalno pominjanje savesti i potrebe za savršenstvom.Verujem u dobre vibracije- slušam predivnu Annie Lennox.Od danas i kraj jednom ciklusu i ulasku u potpuno toplu, strasnu, emotivniju energiju.Venera od danas u erotičnom i zavodljivom znaku Škorpije.Mesec se sprema da udje u ušuškani znak u znak svog doma kada beži u sigurne vode -znak Raka.Potreba za zaštitom i porodicom.Emocije od danas dublje, sentimentalnije, mekanije, ali ne i laganije. 

foto /banjosandbibles.tumbir.com 
12:20am: Mesec u Blizancima na zvezdi Ensis(22,59) nosi osetljivost vida i pospanost.U porastu pretnje i strah od mraka, tajni napadi.Od 3:19am Mesec na zvezdi(24,47) Al Heka povećava borbenu prirodu, ali tvrdoglavost.U porastu fanatizam i emotivne brige.Razgovori sa samim sobom, dosta čitanja i razmišljanja o željama.Otvorite kutiju sreće i zabeležite šta bi želeli da otkrijete o sebi, ali i da vam se ispuni.Odlično vreme za vodjenje dnevnika, poslovna putovanja. 


3:58am: Mesec u Blizancima u opoziciji sa Saturnom u Strelcu na 25,10: vreme koje bi trebalo prespavati jer može doneti brige, sekiraciju, nervozu, pesimizam, crne misli, neverovanje u sreću, negativni naboj.U porastu problemi sa plucima i teže disanje, loša krvna slika, jake prehlade i temperature, ružni snovi, emotivna hladjenja i usamljenost.Osetljivost kostiju, usporenost.Nepovoljnije vreme za saobraćaj. 
foto / veronica kazimirchik 

4:56am: Mesec u Blizancima u sekstilu sa Rx Uranom u Ovnu na 25,47- nagla sreća, budjenja, odlične ideje za one koji ne spavaju, nagla upoznavanja i susreti, zapisivanje želja, molitve, dobar početak dana i novo jutro.Vreme pozitivne transformacije i unutrašnjeg osećaja da je nešto važno pred vama.Odlično vreme za pisanje, učenje, važno dobijanje poruka.Pogled u nebo i nova nada, optimizam, neke više sile koje mogu da se umešaju i donesu bolju inicijativu.Pomirenja. 
foto/tothemarathonandback.tumbir.com 

9:22am: Mesec u Blizancima na zvezdi(28,34) Polaris  istovremena tuga, ali i snaga.Mogućnost pozitivnim promenama, odlično vreme za putovanja, napredak, genijalne ideje, promene na polju državnih poslova, zakona.Važne vesti, dobro vreme za polaganje ispita, selidbe, važno slanje e mailova, humanističke poduhvate, ali i zaradu.Od 9:44am: Mesec na zvezdi Betelgez donosi posebno dobro vreme za takmičenja, sport, jutarnje vežbe, dobre poslovne rezultate i osećaj pobede.Može biti nepovoljnih vremenskih prilika.11:30 Mesec u Blizancima na zvezdi Menkalinan(29,55) može uticati na povećanje požara i napada.Ipak ova zvezda može uticati na jake umne sposobnosti i mnogo emotivnih razgovora.Dosta komunikacija u ovo vreme izmedju zvezde Polaris do zvezde Mekalinan i važnih potpisivanja, pisanja, kontakta sa rodjacima, učenja, potrebe da se pokrenu nove ideje, flertova i simpatija. 


11:41: Mesec u Blizancima u trigonu sa Venerom u Vagi na 29,57 pozitivno vreme za sitnije kupovine, novac, ulepšavanje, dosta kontakta sa papirima, potrebe za harmonijom i pravljenjem kompromisa.Bežaće se od sukoba i svega što može doneti nesklad.Zaljubljenost, dobro vreme za ljubav.Puno simpatija, kontakt asa ženama, dogovora koji mogu doneti dobro raspoloženje. 
foto/John Adam 

11:46am. Mesec prelazi u vodeni, kardinalni, ženski znak Rak.Emocije, emocije, emocije, suze, nagli usponi i padovi, razmišljanja o porodici, suze radosnice, pa tužnice, dom kao utočište od loše energije, potreba za čišćenjem, radom u domu, popravkom, udobnošću doma i privatnošću.Jaka povezanost sa starim prijateljima, potreba za vraćanjem na neki važan dogadjaj koji nosi neslučajne susrete i komunikaciju.Potreba za zaštitom onih koje volite, jaka veza sa decom, žal za bivšim ljubavima, stari filmovi/muzika, stavljanje slika i predmeta koji mogu uticati na snagu i pozitivnu vibraciju u domu, potreba za oslonacem i odobravanjem ljudi koji su vam važni.U osetljivosti grudi, želudac, materica. 
Mesec u krakotrajnom praznom hodu od 11:45-12:20 
foto / Jilian Clasby 
12:40: Venera prelazi u znak Škorpiju, znak svog izgona.Eroticna, duboka emocija, zagonetna, zavodljiva, tajanstvena, kompikovana, zabranjena ide ipak srcem kroz život verujući da hrabri postoje i slični se sličnim raduju.Venera će boraviti u znaku Škorpije do 1.12. O njoj sam pisala i u nekim od prethodnih godina kroz natalni i tranzitni uticaj i :   Ubi me prejaka emocija 
foto  /   Crystal Belvins 

17:21: Mesec u Raku na 3,26 na zvezdi Propus donosi jasan um, intuiciju, i odlično prenošenje emocija na druge, pri čemu nekom možete pomoći svojim savetima i saosećajnosti.Izuzetno povoljna zvezda za uspeh, sreći i uspeh u stvarima koje radite u ovo vreme.Jaki dodiri, emocije u porastu.Dobro vreme za nekretnine, porodična putovanja i posete.20:20 Mesec na zvezdi Dirah veoma osetljivoj zvezdi koja povećava porodično naselje, stomačne probleme, posebne probleme sa onima koji već duže vreme prolaze kroz porodična nezadovoljstva i probleme sa novcem. 
foto /  Shani Charnevirtz 

21: 48: Mesec u Raku trigon Jupiter u Škorpiji na 6,09-period sreće, blagostanja, zaštite, odličnih materijalnih prilika, emotivne sreće i mira, poverljivih razgovora, odličnih mogućnosti kroz dom, porodicu, ljubav.Pozitivno vreme za važne proslave, posebno veridbe/slave.Emocije na visokom intezitetu, dobro vreme za razgovore i planiranje budućnosti. 
ASTRO -VREMEPLOV 
foto / Mireya Nunez 


7.11.1967. rodjen je David Guetta -dj i house muzičar, producent, rodjen u kombinaciji duple Škorpije sa Mesecom u Jarcu.Pred Davidom je posebno plodna godina puna novih ideja i važnih ličnih dešavanja. 
7.11.1943. rodjena je kanadska kantautorrka Joni Mitchell u znaku Škorpije sa podznakom u Raku  i romantičnim Mesecom u Ribama. 

Natasa Paunovski

thread.title: 500만원만으로 오피스텔에 투자할수 있다면? 영종도 트루엘에디션 최저 투자금과 수익률
thread.title_full: 500만원만으로 오피스텔에 투자할수 있다면? 영종도 트루엘에디션 최저 투자금과 수익률 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 지금이 타이밍
posts.title: 500만원만으로 오피스텔에 투자할수 있다면? 영종도 트루엘에디션 최저 투자금과 수익률
posts.text:
영종도 오피스텔 투자를 알아보시는 분들은,
영종하늘도시 중심상권 한복판에 세워지는 영종트루엘 에디션 오피스텔을 들어보셨을 겁니다.
저번주 금요일에 가오픈을 하여 현재 청약 접수중이구요
이번주 부터는 정식계약서 발행이 가능합니다.
최초 300만원으로 원하시는 층, 홋수를 지정해 주신후, 3일내 나머지 계약금 10%를 채워주시면 되는데요
오늘은, 수익률표와 관련하여,
내가 계약했을때 2020년 실제 완공까지 들어가는 실제 내 돈이 얼마나 되는지 포스팅 하겠습니다
대략적으로 말씀드리면,
영종하늘도시 투루웰 중층기준으로 자료를 만들었습니다.
보통 최저층 혹은 최저가 기준으로 잡아, 눈에 보이는 숫자를 늘리거나 줄이기 마련인데요
우린 그런 잔머리 없이, 일반적이고 평균적인 중간층 기준, 중간 금액 기준입니다.
계약금 10% 약 1,300만원을 지불하고 계약을 한후,
중도금 60%는 무이자 대출을 자서하고,
순차적으로 부가세를 환급받으시게 되면
중간층 기준, 진짜로 내 돈이 들어가는 비용은 500만원 정도이며,
실제 가능한 수치입니다
예축이나 예상이 아닌, 실제 현실적이고 정확한 수치입니다.
오피스텔은 가계용 부동산이 아니라, 사업자용 부동산이다보니
의무적으로 부가세를 내게 되어 있습니다.
그렇기에 당연히 분양가에도 포함되어 있구요
그러나, 이 부가세는 결국, 그대로 나라에서 환급을 해줍니다.
가장 좋은 방법은,
부가세를 환급받고, 그 환급받은 그대로 준공시점에서 오히려 P를 붙여 전매를 하는것입니다
​
​
임의적으로 만들어본 수익률 표 인데요
다시한번 말씀 드리지만, 현실적인 수치입니다.
남들 담보대출 3%로 잡을때, 저는 현실적으로 4.5%로 계산했습니다,
그리고, 임대보증금 1,000만원에 월세 70만원이 가능하냐고 묻는 분들을...
아래 포스팅도 참고해 주세요
http://blog.naver.com/hjhoon7305/221134112428
영종도 일성트루엘, 1천만원 소액투자로 1,000만원에 월70만원 월세임대 수익보장까지 영종도에 있는 영종하늘도시, 그중심에 들어서는 총 370세대의 오피스텔인 영종도 일성 트루엘에디션4층~6... blog.naver.com
회사에서 그만큼 임대보장을 해줍니다 물론, 선착순이구요
소액으로 안정적인 투자를 원하신다면, 선착순으로 진행하는 완전 극초기 분양시기에 꼭 2~3개씩 잡아 놓으시기 바랍니다. 임대보장 혜택을 받는다면, 전혀 손해볼일이 없기 때문입니다.
1군 건설사 일성건설, 최강 신탁사 한국투자신탁 그래서 투루엘에디션이 안전하다는 말씀입니다. ​
​
각종 호재가 넘치는 영종도
영종도 투자는 지금이 바로 적기이자 타이밍 입니다
더이상 늦어지면, 그만큼 분양가가 올라간 이후에 지어지는 오피스텔을 계약하셔야 합니다
영종도 부동산 투자는,
오늘이 바로 가장 저렴할때 입니다.
모델하우스는 연중무휴로 운영되며
아래 번호로 연락주시면, 좀 더 자세한 수익률표에 대한 설명도 드리겠습니다
032-460-1845
​

thread.title: How Do I Report someone On Facebook
thread.title_full: How Do I Report someone On Facebook

posts.author: Pelengkap Bangunan (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: How Do I Report someone On Facebook
posts.text: Home » Report Someone » How Do I Report someone On Facebook How Do I Report someone On Facebook Report Someone How Do I Report Someone On Facebook - Facebook has 2 approaches for reporting violations of their terms of service. The very first is for users who have an account. The second is for people who do not have an account, or for users who are unable to access their account. When you report a violation, an employee of Facebook takes a look at the factor for reporting the violation, and at the individual implicated of breaking their terms of service. How Do I Report Someone On Facebook Technique 1. 1. Navigate to Facebook's "Report an Infraction of the Facebook Terms" page for non-account holders.2. Fill out all the info that corresponds to your report in the text boxes. The details you have to include to make a report is your e-mail address, links to the material and person you are reporting, and a description of the problem.3. Click the blue "Submit" button to send out in your report. Facebook will send a reaction to the e-mail address you provided when they examined the report. Approach 2. Report someone on Facebook from your desktop:.- Open your Facebook Account by visiting https://www.facebook.com/ in your wanted browser. Type your username and password in the respective fields if you are not currently logged into Facebook.- Go to the Profile of the person you wish to report. Key in the name of the individual in the search bar. You can click the name if it reveals in the newsfeed rather.- Click on ... located near right corner of the cover image at the top of profile page.- Next click "Report" which comes in the drop down menu.- Click on "Report this profile" then Click "Continue".- Select a report choice by selecting a suitable reason from the options supplied and after that click "Continue".- Click "Submit to Facebook for Review" at last. Some reasons will have the choice of "Ask us to review this profile" rather which you can choose.The above-mentioned actions will assist you in reporting the individual you want. thread.title: Global Experts Call for Action on Vaccination Apathy, and More Protection for Older Adults Against Infectious Diseases
thread.title_full: Global Experts Call for Action on Vaccination Apathy, and More Protection for Older Adults Against Infectious Diseases

posts.title: Global Experts Call for Action on Vaccination Apathy, and More Protection for Older Adults Against Infectious Diseases
posts.text:
Modifica password Global Experts Call for Action on Vaccination Apathy, and More Protection for Older Adults Against Infectious Diseases Vaccination apathy, or hesitancy, as it is also referred to, is defined as the delay in acceptance or refusal of vaccines despite availability of vaccination services.[4] It varies across time, place and vaccine, and incorporates factors such as complacency, convenience and confidence. Vaccination apathy is not only limited to the general public but has also been identified in healthcare providers.[5] BERLIN, ( informazione.it - comunicati stampa - scienza e tecnologia ) 
Vaccination apathy, or hesitancy, as it is also referred to, is defined as the delay in acceptance or refusal of vaccines despite availability of vaccination services. [4] It varies across time, place and vaccine, and incorporates factors such as complacency, convenience and confidence. Vaccination apathy is not only limited to the general public but has also been identified in healthcare providers. [5] 
Session Chair, and leading authority on vaccination confidence, Dr Heidi Larson , Director of The Vaccine Confidence Project at the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine, UK said, "Whilst the majority of the research on vaccination apathy has focused on its prevalence among the general public, studies also show that groups of healthcare professionals, varying across geography and vaccine, may themselves be 'vaccine hesitant'. This is important in light of the high degree of trust patients place in their doctors' opinions and advice. It is important to realise that just as the general public may be influenced by rumours and concerns around vaccines, so may some healthcare providers." 
Dr Larson was joined by experts across the fields of immunology and infectious disease, health policy and management, and ageing. 
Value of vaccination 
Professor Horst von Bernuth , Head of Pediatric Immunology and Infectious Diseases at Charité - Universitätsmedizin, Berlin, Germany said, "Vaccination is one of the most successful and cost-effective health interventions ever. It has saved countless lives and improved health and well-being around the globe. Despite this, for a multitude of reasons, vaccination apathy is a widespread global issue and a key barrier to protecting the community against infectious disease." 
The need for a life-course approach to vaccination 
Dr Jane Barratt , Secretary General of the International Federation on Ageing, Canada highlighted the importance of a life-course approach to immunisation in the context of the ageing population said, "By 2060, 30% of Europeans will be aged 65 years or over. We know that as we age, our immune systems becomes less effective, which places older people at an increased risk of infections. This results in an increased burden of disease, higher rates of hospitalisation, and increasing pressure on health services. A life-course approach to immunisation, which includes adult vaccination is a cost-effective method for achieving better health outcomes across the life course, and managing the societal impact of ageing." Dr Barratt further discussed a recent study [6] that estimated burden of community acquired pneumonia (CAP) in the United States to be substantial, with more than 1.5 million adults hospitalized annually of whom 100,000 die. "Overall, approximately one in three patients hospitalized with CAP die within a year of admission," said Dr Barratt. 
Applying behavioural economics to understanding and addressing vaccination apathy 
Dr. Douglas Hough , Associate Scientist and Director at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, USA , explored how the application of behavioural economics can assist in both understanding and addressing emotional and cognitive biases affecting vaccination decision-making. 
He discussed cognitive biases such as omission bias - the tendency, under conditions of uncertainty, to take no action, in preference to taking an action that might be regretted later [7] , placing them in the context of vaccination decision-making. A concept related to this is the nocebo effect - the tendency to experience exaggerated side effects after having read or seen material that creates negative expectations [8] . 
He said, "It is evident that vaccination decision-making is not purely based on rational choice. Public health interventions and patient-doctor interactions around vaccination need to take this into account. Behavioural economics lends itself to the further understanding of vaccination apathy among both the general public and healthcare professionals, and helping to inform vaccination programmes which address it." 
The panel discussion concluded with a lively debate around the issues raised and covered the following points: 
As a final rallying cry, the panellists, led by Dr Heidi Larson called for global action: 
"With the pace of global ageing gathering momentum, the need to protect older adults against infectious diseases is coming increasingly to the fore. Vaccination apathy is a global issue and a key barrier to protecting the community against infectious disease. Healthcare professionals, policy makers and public health bodies should consider how they can address vaccination apathy through traditional, and novel approaches and strategies." 
About the World Health Summit 
The World Health Summit is the annual conference of the M8 Alliance of Academic Health Centers, Universities and National Academies. Through the Inter Academy Partnership (IAP) for Health, it is organized in collaboration with national academies of science in 97 countries. 
The World Health Summit aims to improve health all over the planet, catalysing that process through collaboration and open dialogue, and steering tomorrow's agenda to improve research, education, healthcare, and policy outcomes. 
Visit the website for further information: https://www.worldhealthsummit.org . 
1. European Parliamentary Research Service. Older people in Europe : EU policies and programmes. 2014;p. 1-8. 
2. Garau J, Hodin M, Kalache A. Life-Course Immunization: A Driver of Healthy Aging [Internet]. Global Coalition on Aging; 2017 [cited October 2017 ]. Available from: https://www.globalcoalitiononaging.com/v2/data/uploads/documents/life-course-immunization_gcoa-for-web.pdf 
3. Voyer B. 'Nudging' behaviours in healthcare: Insights from behavioural economics. British Journal of Healthcare Management. 2015;21(3):130-135. 
4. Report of the SAGE Working Group on vaccine hesitancy [Internet]. WHO; 2014 [cited October 2017 ]. Available from: https://www.who.int/immunization/sage/meetings/2014/october/SAGE_working_group_revised_report_vaccine_hesitancy.pdf?ua=1 
5. Dubé E. Addressing vaccine hesitancy: the crucial role of healthcare providers. Clinical Microbiology and Infection. 2017;23(5):279-280. 
6. Ramirez JA, Peyrani P et al. Adults Hospitalized with Pneumonia in the United States : Incidence, Epidemiology & Mortality. Clin Infect Dis. 2017. 
7. Connolly T, Reb J. Omission bias in vaccination decisions: Where's the "omission"? Where's the "bias"?. Organizational Behavior and Human Decision Processes. 2003;91(2):186-202. 
8. Colloca L, Miller F. The Nocebo Effect and Its Relevance for Clinical Practice. Psychosomatic Medicine. 2011;73(7):598-603. Ufficio Stampa

thread.title: UK to partner Nigeria in fish farming
thread.title_full: UK to partner Nigeria in fish farming

posts.author: PM NEWS Live
posts.title: UK to partner Nigeria in fish farming
posts.text:
UK to partner Nigeria in fish farming 5 hours ago Politics 
The United Kingdom (UK) and Nigeria are set to partner in the areas of “sophisticated” fish farming and infrastructure development. 
This was the outcome of the meeting between a UK Trade Delegation to Nigeria and the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Geoffrey Onyeama. 
The Head of the UK delegation, Mr Emmanuel Finndoro-Obasi, said the team was in the country to explore areas of collaboration with Nigeria. 
Finndoro-Obasi, also a Director, Africa House London Limited, said that the mission was aimed at further enhancing UK relations with Africa. 
“We are looking at bringing in one of the most sophisticated fish farming into the country that would be capable of producing tonnes of fish. 
“Discussion is currently going on with local partners and they will specialise on Tilapia; that is one thing we believe will help the country. 
“In infrastructure, we are engaging with NAMA to build 5000 homes. 
“We are currently engaging also with Niger state, looking at building and renovating their hospital equipment to reduce the amount of medical migration,” he said. 
In his response, the foreign affairs minister said the Federal Government was promoting business friendly environment to enhance foreign investment and local exports. 
The minister said that the country’s foreign missions would be used to promote business partnerships globally. 
“The idea is that with the 114 countries which we have embassies in, we are going to use each embassy as an extension of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. 
“So, there would be a focal point in each embassy whose job would be to create partnerships between Nigerian businesses and foreign businesses. 
“In the case of the UK for instance, any Nigerian entrepreneur that wants to partner with UK business will upload onto a database that we are preparing online,” Onyeama said. In this article

posts.author: Thien Menh (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Factors To Reflect On When Choosing Window Tint Installers Philadelphia
posts.text:
By Brenda Kelly 

If you are looking for an efficient and safe method to improve the energy efficiency of your home, business or car, you should consider having tinted glasses installed. You need to get a professional window tint installers Philadelphia . Tinting your windows provide your house or car with a higher level of protection and privacy. A home and a car are some of the things that people consider precious hence the need to find a professional expert who can do a good job.

The tint installer should be licensed to carry out tinting activities. There are a lot of contractors that do not have the right licensing and certification to operate. A license will confirm the authenticity of the expert. A good installer will be confident to provide their certification documents to prove that they have the training necessary for window tinting. You have to quickly walk away from an expert who lacks certification.

Insurance cover is an essential requirement for a tinting specialist. Thus, an excellent tinting expert should be insured and bonded. Tinting involves working on glass, cars, and homes. One will need an insurance policy covers them in case of any damage during the work. A serious and professional tinting contractor should at least have a general liability insurance coverage.

Always remember to hire a tinting agency that offers warranties on your tint. If the installer is confident of their quality work, they would have no problem providing a warranty on their work. For peace of mind choose a tint that comes with a lifetime warranty. Well, this will give you a guarantee that every penny that you have paid for will count.

It is the interest of any customer that they get a beautiful and durable tint. Therefore, you need an experienced tinting specialist. A good indication that one is experienced and skillful is the duration they have been in the business. The most successful and reputable tinting companies have been around for years. They have amassed a large and loyal customer following. This speaks volumes about that business.

It is wise when you ask to see the samples of the work that a company has been doing. An excellent firm will have no problem with showing their quality and good work that they have done before. Ask for images or even visit their working yard. There you can see the job is done with your own eyes. Having first-hand information will help you assess the quality being offered.

A professional tinting specialist should give free estimates. This is because the price is always a factor to consider when seeking for services. It is wise to shop around to compare prices. With that information, you can compare the estimates and choose the one that fits your budget.

Finally, you have to always remember to ask about the current window films offered by the installer. Each type of film is made to provide a specific level of sun protection and security. An inferior quality tint is easily noticeable and will spoil the looks of the windows of the car or house.




About the Author:

You can find the best window tint installers Philadelphia locals can hire by touring our web pages today. To access our image gallery and know more about the benefits of window tinting, use the links at http://www.tintitis.com/benefits-of-window-tinting .

thread.title_full: 段浩雨：黄金投资中几种重要的心得技巧助你稳健盈利！_现货沥青白银黄金_城市公众论坛

posts.author: 段浩雨 发表于
posts.title: 段浩雨：黄金投资中几种重要的心得技巧助你稳健盈利！_现货沥青白银黄金_城市公众论坛
posts.text:
段浩雨：黄金投资中几种重要的心得技巧助你稳健盈利！
​
1.善用理财预算，切记勿用生活必需资金为资本。想为成为功的白银投资--保证金交易者，首先要切记勿用你的生活资金做为交易的资本，资金压力过大会误导你的投资策略，徒增交易风险，而导致更大的错误。而每次投资最好是你闲散资金的三分之一，等做成功了可以逐步加入。而当你的赢利超过你的本金有余时，最好把本金抽回，利用赢余的资金去做。
2.严格止损减低风险。当你做交易的同时应确立可容忍的亏损范围，善用止损交易，才不致于出现巨额亏损，亏损范围依帐户资金情形，最好设定在帐户总额3-10%，当亏损金额已达你的容忍限度，不要找寻借口试图孤注一掷去等待行情回转，应立即平仓，即使5分钟后行情真的回转，不要婉息，因为你已除去行情继续转坏，损失无限扩大的风险。你必需拟定交易策略，切记是你去控制交易，而不是让交易控制了你，自己伤害自己。应以帐户金额衡量交易量，勿过度交易。永远把保证资金安全放在第一位。
3.止赢和止损同样重要。要记住市场古老通则：亏损部位要尽快终止，获利部位能持有多久就放多久。另一重要守则是不要让亏损发生在原已获利的部位上，面对市场突如其来的反转走势，与其平仓于没有获利的情形也不要让原已获利的仓位变成亏损的情形。具体做法是随着价格的上扬（或下降）逐步提高（或降低）你的止损（赢）位置，不要自相情愿的认为会无限的涨下去，坚决不要把已经获利的单子做成亏损。
4.交易资金要充足。帐户金额越少，交易风险越大，因此要避免让交易帐户仅有做一手的金额，做一手的帐户金额是不容许犯下一个错误，但是，即使经验丰富的保证金交易人也有判断错误的时侯。
5.交易不易过度频繁。一般情况下，不要在上下2-3元的范围内进行交易，除非你已经是一个短线高手，最好在一个支撑位上扎或者一个阻力位上沽，范围最少要5元以上；也不要在亏损后急于翻本，应该冷静下来，仔细分析，然后再战。面对亏损的情形，切记勿急于开立反向的新仓位欲图翻身，这往往只会使情况变的更糟。只有在你认为原来的预测及决定完全错误的情况之下，可以尽快了结亏损的仓位再开一个反向的新仓位。切记不要情绪化，宁可错过机会，决不冒险做错。
6.勿逆势操作，在一个上升浪中只可以做多，同样在一个下降浪中只可以做空，甚至只要行情没有出现大的反转，切记勿逆势操作！不以一次几元的回调而感到惋惜，只须在回调的支撑位上伏击便可。市场不会因人的意志为转移，市场只会是按市场的规律延伸。
7.操作尽量避开价格变动频繁难以预测的时段。初学者进行交易应避开价格上下变动频繁时段，如纽约刚开盘的时候，此时价格较无脉胳可循，难以预测；应该等到上下浮动完成有了方向的时候再进入，除非你有十分把握，如果交易初期你在这种时段进行交易，只会影响你的交易信心；关注段浩雨威信dhy776及时了解市场资讯，把握大趋势行情助你稳健获利！
8.学会彻底执行交易策略，勿找借口推翻原有的决定。交易最大致命性而且会摧毁每件事的错误是，当你（在损失已扩大至所做资金的30%）损失了开始找借口不要认赔平仓，想着行情可能一下子就会回转？在你持续有这个念头时，就不会有心去结束这个损失继续扩大的仓位，而只会失去理智地等待着行情回转。市场变化是无情的，不会因为任何人的痴心等待而回转行情。当损失超过50%或更多时，最终交易人将会被迫平仓，甚至3倍以至于暴仓，交易人不只损失了金钱也损失了魄力，他们会让自己失去信心及决定，这个错误产生的原因很简单-贪。损失20%不会让你失去补回损失的机会，而且有可能下次的交易能获利更多，但是在一两笔交易中损失一个仓位，你彻底毁了赚更多钱的机会，这笔损失难以补平。为了避免这个致命性错误的产生，必需记住一个简单的规则-不要让风险超过原已设定的可容忍范围，一旦损失已至原设定的限度，不要犹豫，立即平仓。
9.切勿有急于翻身的交易心态。面对亏损的情形，切记勿急于开立反向的新仓位欲图翻身，这往往只会使情况变的更糟。只有在你认为原来的预测及决定完全错误的情况之下，可以尽快了结亏损的仓位再开一个反向的新仓位。不要跟市场变化玩猜一猜的游戏，错失交易机会，总比产生亏损来的好。
10.错误难免，要汲取教训，切勿重蹈覆辙。错误及损失的产生在所难免，不要责备你自己，重要的是从中记取教训，避免再犯同样的错误。另外，要学会控制情绪，不要因赚了100而雀跃不已，也不用因损失了100而想撞墙。交易中，个人情绪越少，你越能看清市场的情况并做出正确的决定。要以冷静的心态面对得失，要了解交易人不是从获利中学习，而是从损失中成长，当了解每一次损失的原因时，即表示你又向获利之途迈进一步，因为你已找到正确的方向。
11.循序渐进，以谨慎的态度学习保证金交易。缺乏谨傎的心态与操作技巧，用赌博式的高风险式的交易手法，只会给你带来损失耐心学习，勤能补拙.
段浩雨温馨提示：投资不是投机，抓准时机，拒绝盲目，无时机请休息，请珍惜自己挣来的每一滴血和汗！投资有风险，入市需谨慎，把握最精确的走势，让我们的投资更加理智。
本文作者：段浩雨【转载请标明出处】
σ-σ：16538-16327（V信：dhy776）
作者赠言：人生若只如初见，相逢相聚便是缘！

thread.title: Sonbaharda inanç ve doğa turizminin mola noktası Darende
thread.title_full: Sonbaharda inanç ve doğa turizminin mola noktası Darende

posts.title: Sonbaharda inanç ve doğa turizminin mola noktası Darende
posts.text:
Sonbaharda inanç ve doğa turizminin mola noktası Darende Anadolu'nun inanç ve doğa turizmi merkezlerinden Malatya'nın Darende ilçesi, sonbahar mevsiminde ziyaretçilerine görsel şölen sunuyor. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:32 16 Okunma 
MALATYA - AYHAN İŞCEN 
Anadolu 'nun inanç ve doğa turizmi merkezlerinden Malatya'nın Darende ilçesi , tarihi ve doğal güzellikleriyle sonbaharda da ziyaretçilerini büyülüyor. 
Somuncu Baba Külliyesi'nin hemen yanı başındaki Tohma Kanyonu, yavaş yavaş sonbaharın renklerine bürünürken, yüksek kayalıklara tırmanan sarmaşıklar renk cümbüşüyle ziyaretçilerine doyumsuz bir manzara sunuyor. 
Jeolojik dönemlerdeki kırılmalarla oluşan sarp kayalıklar arasından akan suyu taşıyan kanyon, kent yaşamının stresinden uzaklaşmak isteyen doğa tutkunlarının mola noktası olarak görülüyor. 
Dört mevsim binlerce misafir ağırlayan ilçe, doğanın uykuya dalıp yenilenme sürecine geçmeden önce sunduğu renk şölenine şahit olmak isteyenlere ev sahipliği yapıyor. 
Ziyaretçiler, Somuncu Baba Külliyesi'nde ibadet etme imkanı ve altın sarısı kayısı bahçelerini gezme fırsatı buluyor, Günpınar Şelalesi'nde sonbaharın tüm renkleriyle buluşuyor. "Tabiat harikası bir yer"
Darende Kaymakamı Enver Hakan Zengince, AA muhabirine yaptığı açıklamada, ilçenin Anadolu’nun inanç ve tabiat turizminin merkezlerinden olduğunu söyledi. 
Turizm ile ön plana çıkan ilçenin yılda yaklaşık 500 bin ziyaretçi ağırladığına değinen Zengince, şöyle devam etti: 
"Darende, doğunun batısı, batının doğusu durumundaki bir kapı. Ziyaretçilerimiz ilçemizde başta Somuncu Baba Külliyesi olmak üzere birçok manevi merkezi görme, ziyaret etme ve buralarda ibadet etme imkanı buluyorlar. Darende'miz doğal güzellikleriyle de sonbaharda ziyaretçilerine görsel bir şölen sunmakta. İlçemize gelen misafirler, Somuncu Baba Külliyesi’nin hemen yanı başındaki Tohma Kanyonu’nu ve Günpınar Şelalesi’ni gezme imkanı bulurken, sonbaharın renk cümbüşü içerisinde kayısı ağaçlarının güzelliğini izleme imkanı da bulmakta. Biz, yurt içi ve yurt dışından gelen bütün ziyaretçileri buradaki sonbahar güzelliğini izlemeye ve manevi havayı teneffüs etmeye davet ediyoruz." 
Ailesiyle Somuncu Baba Külliyesi’ne ziyarete gelen Hatice Ergül ise ilk defa gördüğü Tohma Kanyonu’nu ve külliyenin manevi havasını çok beğendiğini belirterek ilçenin tabiat harikası bir yer olduğunu ifade etti. 
Ahmet Yalçın da Darende'nin manevi havasını teneffüs etmekten büyük bir keyif aldığını anlatarak "Tohma Kanyonu inanılmaz güzel. Kanyon içerisinde temizlik ve doğallık hakim. Gördüğüm başka yerlere kıyasla buradaki insanlar doğal yaşama gayet saygılı. Buraların mutlaka keşfedilmesi, tanıtılması gerekli." diye konuştu. 
Kaynak: AA

thread.title: Кто в театре главный или результат решает всё...
thread.title_full: Кто в театре главный или результат решает всё...

posts.author: Letopisec (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Кто в театре главный или результат решает всё...
posts.text: Так уж устроен человек, что многое в жизни становится ему понятным после того, как он получил значимую информацию. Непонятно?  Ну, к примеру, когда девочка в школе слышит от учительницы фразу " за это время родить можно!", она не до конца понимает, насколько это долго. А вот после того, как она станет мамой, да ещё не дай Бог, роды будут сложными, вот  тут до неё дойдёт смысл этой фразы!            В подобном  положении долгие годы был я, вспоминая фразу Владимира Высоцкого "кино - это режиссёрское искусство".  Мне долгие годы было непонятно, а что, есть какое-то другое искусство? То есть, род деятельности, в котором первую скрипку "играет" другая специальность?         Ответ пришёл с того времени, как я познакомился с театром. И теперь могу утверждать однозначно - да, кино это искусство режиссёрское, потому, что там главный - режиссер. А вот театр - это искусство актёрское. Потому, что там главный - актёр. Вернее стоит сказать так - "современный театр - это, в первую очередь, талантливый актёр". Не согласны? Тогда познакомьтесь с аргументами.            Чем технологически театр  отличается от кино? Точнее - кинофильм от театральной постановки? В первую очередь тем, что выражаясь телевизионным языком, кинофильм зрители наблюдают в записи, а театральная постановка идёт в прямом эфире! И режиссёр, каким бы талантливым он не был, не в состоянии что-то изменить непосредственно во время спектакля! В кино, если актёр отыграл эпизод плохо, режиссёр объяснит, в чём ошибка и эпизод снимут второй, третий и так далее раз. Я не собираюсь сейчас говорить, что там хорошо, а там плохо, нет. Это особенности разных видов искусства и это прекрасно.       Речь о другом. Талант актёра проявляется намного ярче в театре. Потому что каждый раз - это новый образ, актёр не может работать как видеомагнитофон - сегодня он финальный монолог говорил чуть громче, а вчера он звучал чуть тише. Вчера он через сцену просто быстро прошёл, а завтра может почему-то пробежать. И не потому, что он рассеянный, а потому, что он сегодня именно так чувствует роль! Вот так всё сложилось в этот вечер...            За это любят театральные актёры театр, за возможность каждый раз проживать роль, а не быть механической куклой, которая, как заведённая повторяет одно и то же. И за это же любят театр зрители, потому что приходя в десятый раз на одну и ту же постановку, с одним и тем же составом актёров, они всё равно находят для себя что-то новое. Я не преувеличиваю, "Таксиста" я смотрел как раз десять раз. Правда, состав, увы, менялся.            Кто-то может сказать, что это неправильно, что режиссёр должен вмешаться, внести коррективы...Но уважаемые дамы и господа, современный театр - это механизм, система, которая ориентирована не на интересы режиссёра, а на реакцию зрительского зала. Вы когда-нибудь видел тренера, который кардинально меняет установку команде, если она продолжает выигрывать? Если тренер не идиот, то он этого делать не будет. А для театра результат - это реакция зала. Если она положительная, люди радуются тому, что происходит на сцене, оставляют восхищённые отклики в книге отзывов на сайте театра, в группах и форумах - то как бы ни сожалел режиссёр по поводу произошедших изменений, но портить картину ему никто не позволит.           Конечно, стоит подчеркнуть - речь идёт о по -настоящему талантливом актёре! Кто-то может сказать, что ведь их не так много, тем более, в провинциальных театрах. Но реальность такова, что зрители и ходят в театр "на кого-то". Справедливо это или нет, но так складывается ситуация - есть "звёзды", а есть те, кто находятся рядом. Несправедливо? Возможно. Но  каждый актёр свободен в своём выборе. Не нравится распределение ролей? Считаешь, что ты достоин большего? Ищи другой театр, где твой талант оценят по достоинству! Впрочем, это уже тема для отдельного разговора....

posts.author: dungbvtima
posts.title: Startup fintech Việt Nam nhận vốn triệu USD từ quỹ ngoại
posts.text:
Dịch vụ Tima cung cấp nền tảng công nghệ cho vay ngang hàng (P2P) vừa gọi vốn Series A thành công từ một quỹ đầu tư Singapore.Tuy không ban bố tính danh cụ thể nhà đầu tư cũng như chi tiết thương vụ, nhưng một lãnh đạo điều hành Tima cho biết giá trị đầu tư vào khoảng bảy con số, tức trên một triệu USD, nhằm giúp thúc đẩy công ty tăng trưởng tại Việt Nam.Ra mắt năm 2015, nền móng cho vay P2P này đã huy động được 2,5 nghìn tỷ đồng, tương đương 115,45 triệu USD, từ các đối tác cho vay.Với 967 người cho vay, bao gồm các công ty tài chính, nhà đầu tư và tổ chức tín dụng, Tima đã giúp thực hành thành công hơn 2 triệu giao dịch trên nền móng của hãng.
"Chúng tôi đã phát triển dựa trên mô hình LendingClub sao cho hiệp với thị trường Việt Nam. Tima đã cho nhà đầu tư thấy các hướng kinh dinh chính và giấy phép hoạt động trong ngành này tại Việt Nam, và mọi thứ đều hoạt động ổn thỏa", một đồng sáng lập viên của Tima cho biết trên trang DealStreetAsia.
Theo một vắng của nhà băng Thế giới (WB), khoảng 80% người đi vay tại Việt Nam không được tiếp cận nhanh chóng với các dịch vụ tài chính. Khái niệm cho vay P2P cho đến nay vẫn còn là khá mới mẻ tại đây và được cho là một giải pháp giải quyết tỉnh trạng này.
Trên website của Tima, công ty này cho biết là doanh nghiệp trước hết cung cấp nền móng công nghệ cho vay P2P tại Việt Nam.
Theo thống kê toàn cầu từ KPMG và CB Insights, có tới 42% trong số 19 startup kỳ lân (các công ty khởi nghiệp chưa niêm yết được định giá từ 1 tỷ USD) trong lĩnh vực fintech là các nền móng P2P.
Một loạt các startup trong lĩnh vực fintech tại Việt Nam đã nhận được vốn từ các quỹ đầu tư mạo hiểm trong năm nay, trong đó có ví điện tử MoMo (nhận 28 triệu USD từ Standard Chartered và Goldman Sachs), OnOnPay (nhận 800.000 USD từ Gobi Partners và các đối tác khác) và BankGo.
Tima cho phép người vay tiền đăng ký khoản vay online, duyệt thông tin đăng ký qua điện thoại, sau đó ký giao kèo tại địa điểm được chỉ định. Theo đó, khách hàng có thể nhận được tiền giải ngân duyệt y trương mục nhà băng hoặc tại các điểm giao dịch là đối tác của Tima trên cả nước.

thread.title_full: Od nove godine poskupljuju cigarete i duvan

posts.author: Dragana Eremija
posts.title: Od nove godine poskupljuju cigarete i duvan
posts.text:
Od nove godine poskupljuju cigarete i duvan 07. nov. 2017. 10:31 Objavljeno u FINANSIJE 
BANJALUKA – Upravni odbor Uprave za indirektno oporezivanje BiH usvojio je na jučerašnjoj sjednici u Mostaru Odluku o utvrđivanju specifične i minimalne akcize na cigarete i duvan za pušenje za narednu godinu, koja će se primjenjivati od 1. januara. 
Prema usvojenoj odluci, od 1. januara naredne godine minimalna akciza iznosiće 2,60 KM umjesto 2,42 KM, a specifična akciza umjesto 1,35 KM iznosiće 1,50 KM za pakovanje cigareta od 20 komada, saopšteno je iz Ministarstva finansija i trezora BiH. 
Akciza na duvan za pušenje utvrđuje se u visini od 80 odsto minimalne akcize i iznosiće 104 KM umjesto dosadašnjih 96,80 KM po kilogramu. 
Usvojena je Odluka o utvrđivanju količine dizel goriva koje se koristi za potrebe rudnika, termoelektrana i željeznica na koje se ne plaća putarina za narednu godinu. Odredbe ove odluke odnose se na dizel gorivo koje koriste rudnici i termoelektrane u procesu proizvodnje i željeznice za pogon šinskih vozila, i to na određenu količinu koju odobri UO UIO na prijedlog vlada entiteta i Brčko distrikta. Ova odluka primjenjivaće se od 1. januara. 
Upravni odbor usvojio je i izmjene pravilnika o primjeni Zakona o akcizama u BiH i Pravilnik o primjeni Zakona o porezu na dodatnu vrijednost koji se odnosi na elektronsko podnošenje prijava kod obračuna akciza i PDV-a. Nezavisne novine

posts.author: Arcadia Spot (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Δεύτερη η Λαμπροπούλου της ΑΕΚ Τρίπολης στη Φιλοθέη
posts.text:
Ακόμα μια μεγάλη επιτυχία για την αθλήτρια του ομίλου μας Λαμπροπούλου Σήλια  στο Φιλοθέη  Tennis   Open  2017. Το τουρνουά που έγινε στις εγκαταστάσεις του Φιλοθέη  Tennis   Club   είναι από τα δυνατότερα των Αθηνών με αρκετά μεγάλες συμμετοχές. 
Η αθλήτρια της ΑΕΚ Τρίπολης κατάφερε να μπει μέσα στην τετράδα του τουρνουά και να παλέψει στον μεγάλο τελικό την μεγαλύτερη από αυτή αθλήτρια  Todorova Gavriella   no 2  του ταμπλό. Η Λαμπροπούλου κατέκτησε τελικά την 2 η  θέση του τουρνουά καθώς ηττήθηκε με 61, 62 στον τελικό παίζοντας πολύ καλό τένις κατά την διάρκεια όλου του παιχνιδιού. Πολλά συγχαρητήρια από το ΔΣ και την προπονητική ομάδα της ΑΕΚ Τρίπολης.

thread.title: Idris Elba et Jessica Chastain se verraient bien dans la suite de Ça - Actualité Film - EcranLarge.com
thread.title_full: Idris Elba et Jessica Chastain se verraient bien dans la suite de Ça - Actualité Film - EcranLarge.com

posts.author: Christophe Foltzer
posts.title: Idris Elba et Jessica Chastain se verraient bien dans la suite de Ça - Actualité Film - EcranLarge.com
posts.text:
Idris Elba et Jessica Chastain se verraient bien dans la suite de Ça Idris Elba et Jessica Chastain se verraient bien dans la suite de Ça Mise à jour : 09/11/2017 02:24 - Créé : November 7, 2017 - Christophe Foltzer Commentaires 
Forcément, lorsque l'on est l'un des plus gros succès du cinéma d'horreur de tous les temps, les gens font attention à nous, on commence à nous écouter, limite on dévient séduisant. Comme dans la vraie vie en fait. 
Que vous l'ayiez apprécié ou non n'a que peu d'importance au final puisque Ça restera l'un des plus gros événements de cette année et le succès surprise de cette rentrée. Mais le plus dur reste à faire puisque, en effet, c'est le 6 septembre 2019 que sortira la seconde partie, centrée sur nos héros à présent adultes, et le film devra faire au moins aussi bien que son ainé pour obtenir lui aussi ses lettres de noblesse. 

Toujours réalisé par Andres Muschietti, Ça - Partie 2 n'a pas encore fait vraiment parler de lui que déjà les fans rêvent de son casting. Compte-tenu du succès historique du précédent métrage, le studio et le réalisateur peuvent se permettre de voir les choses en grand et d'envisager une brochette de comédiens qu'ils n'auraient pas forcément pu approcher en temps normal. Et évidemment, tout le monde pense à Jessica Chastain dans le rôle de Bev adulte. 

On y pense tellement d'ailleurs que nos confrères de ScreenRant se sont jetés sur elle, lors de la promo de son nouveau film Le Grand Jeu , où elle partage l'affiche avec Idris Elba , pour savoir si elle serait éventuellement intéressée par un tel rôle. Et sa réponse va vous faire plaisir : 
"J'aime Andy et Barbara (la productrice). J'ai travaillé avec Andy sur son premier film., vous savez, Mama. C'était ses débuts. Et vous savez, Barbara est l'une de mes meilleures amies, donc bon...Nous verrons." 
Jessica Chastain dans Mama 
Une déclaration interrompue brièvement par un Idris Elba qui, apparemment, aimerait bien qu'on pense à lui pour le rôle de Mike : 
"Prenez-moi ! J'adore ce film !" 
Ce qui a conduit Jessica Chastain à clarifier quelque peu son propos : 
"Ecoutez, bien sûr, je veux travailler avec eux. Ce sont mes amis, ils sont comme ma famille. Quoi qu'ils fassent, je veux en faire partie, donc j'espère que nous allons rendre cela possible." 
Et c'est vrai que ce serait l'évidence d'avoir Chastain pour Bev adulte, que ce serait juste parfait. Par contre, pour Idris Elba en Mike, on ne sait pas trop. Mais ça c'est probablement parce qu'il était dans La Tour Sombre et qu'il a donc déjà eu droit à son Stephen King. En tout cas, ce sont d'excellentes nouvelles pour la suite.

Tolltartó két rekesszel, színátmenetes mintával
Szeretnéd felturbózni iskolaszettedet valami igazán különlegessel? 
Ez a trendi tolltartó tökéletes tárolója minden írószerednek! 
Két rekeszének segítségével tolladnak, radírodnak, hegyeződnek, és még a vonalzódnak is jut benne hely. Egyszerűen, átláthatóan rendszerezheted ceruzáid, a fenti rekeszben egy gumipánttal rögzítheted is őket. 
A letisztult mintákat a színátmenetek hozzák teljes összhangba stílusoddal! Strapabíró keménypapírból készült, 20x5, 5x5cm méretű, ideális kicsiknek és nagyoknak is. Könnyen záródik, így attól sem kell félned, hogy táskád mélyében kiborulna. 
A tolltartó a készlet erejéig rózsaszín, világoskék felhő-csillagmintákkal vagy lila-világoskék csillagmintákkal elérhető. 
Tulajdonságok: 
Kétrekeszes
Belső rögzítő gumipánttal
Két -féle mintában: Felhő, éjszakai csillag
Mérete: 20x5, 5x5cm
Anyaga: Keménypapír
Strapabíró
Jól záródó
Anyaga: Keménypapír
Írószer tárolására
3-99 éves korig
Megjegyzésbe írd le milyen színben és mintával szeretnéd! : )

posts.author: Наталья Сельдемирова
posts.title: За год заведено 500 уголовных дел о попытке подкупа инспекторов ГИБДД водителями
posts.text:
09:22 07.11.2017 За год заведено 500 уголовных дел о попытке подкупа инспекторов ГИБДД водителями 
Министр внутренних дел Владимир Колокольцев сообщил, что в 2017 году от инспекторов ГИБДД поступило 1,5 тыс. сообщений о попытках подкупа со стороны водителей, возбуждено 500 уголовных дел. В интервью газете «Известия» Колокольцев сказал, что надо активнее работать в этом направлении, потому что априори понятно: не будут давать - не будут брать. Глава МВД обратил внимание на то, что «в нашем обществе создалась атмосфера нетерпимости к взяткополучателям, но почему-то нет такого же отношения к взяткодателям». Что касается вымогательства со стороны инспекторов, то позиция министерства - жесточайше карать таких сотрудников и их руководителей, подчеркнул Колокольцев. Он отметил, что принцип персональной ответственности действует для всех - от руководителей районного звена до заместителей главы МВД. <>

The Duni brand is sold in more than 40 markets and enjoys a number one position in Central and Northern Europe . Duni has some 2,300 employees in 23 countries, headquarters in Malmö and production units in Sweden , Germany , Poland , Thailand and New Zealand . Duni is listed on NASDAQ Stockholm under the ticker name "DUNI". ISIN-code is SE 0000616716. 
This information is information that Duni AB is obliged to make public pursuant to the EU Market Abuse Regulation. The information was submitted for publication, through the agency of the contact person set out above, at 9.30 CET on November 7, 2017 .

thread.title: «القوى العاملة» تطرح مبادرة لدمج العمالة غير المنتظمة بالقطاع الرسمي
thread.title_full: «القوى العاملة» تطرح مبادرة لدمج العمالة غير المنتظمة بالقطاع الرسمي | المصري اليوم

posts.author: almasryalyoum.com
posts.title: «القوى العاملة» تطرح مبادرة لدمج العمالة غير المنتظمة بالقطاع الرسمي
posts.text:
أكد وزير القوى العاملة، محمد سعفان، ضرورة تكاتف جميع المؤسسات من أجل دمج القطاع غير الرسمي بالقطاع الرسمي واحتواء العمالة غير المنتظمة، التي تمثل 60% من مجمل العمالة المصرية، والعمل على تقنين أوضاعها، ووضعها على المسار الصحيح المناسب لكل فئة منها لتعظيم إيجابياتها، والحد من سلبياتها، فضلا عن حمايتها من الاستغلال بجميع صوره.
أخبار متعلقة
تجديد حبس وكيل وزارة القوى العاملة بالإسماعيلية والمدير المالي 15 يومًا
«القوى العاملة» تصدر بيانًا عن مستحقات العمال المصريين في «بن لادن» السعودية
استعراض خطة تنمية السويس بحضور وزيري التنمية المحلية والقوى العاملة
جاء ذلك في الاجتماع الذي عقده الوزير بديوان عام الوزارة، بحضور ممثلين عن وزارات القوى العاملة، والمالية، والإنتاج الحربي، ورئيس صندوق التأمين الاجتماعي، وجهاز تنمية المشروعات المتوسطة والصغيرة، واتحاد الغرف التجارية، لعرض مبادرة الوزارة لدمج القطاع غير الرسمي بالقطاع الرسمي واحتواء العمالة غير المنتظمة، من خلال إصدار تراخيص مؤقتة لمزاولة أنشطته لاحتواء شريحة كبيرة من المجتمع وتحقيق معيشة كريمة لهم.
وشدد «سعفان» على أن تبني وزارة القوى العاملة هذه المبادرة يخدم أهداف الدولة التي تسعى إلى الحد من مشكلة البطالة، وخفض معدلات الجريمة والانحراف، فضلا عن تفعيل وتنشيط ودعم دور المشروعات الصغيرة لامتصاص فائض القوى العاملة في القطاع الرسمي، بالإضافة إلى رفع سقف الأداء الانضباطي بالشارع المصري وإعادة المظهر الحضاري له.
وقال الوزير أن دمج القطاع غير الرسمي في القطاع الرسمي سيضع صورة حقيقية للاقتصاد، ويوضح حجم البطالة الفعلية التي تؤثر بشكل كبير في تصنيف الاقتصاد المصري عالميًا.
وناقش الاجتماع السبل الممكنة لتحفيز العمالة غير الرسمية للانضمام للقطاع الرسمي والحصول على تراخيص، ووضع آلية لتنفيذ هذا المشروع بالتعاون مع جميع الجهات المعنية، فضلا عن المعوقات التي قد تواجه التنفيذ، وكيفية مواجهتها.
وأكد المشاركون استعدادهم للتعاون من أجل تنفيذ هذه المبادرة ووضع مقترح لخطة تنفيذها ومناقشته في الاجتماعات المقبلة، فيما تم خلال الاجتماع عرض فيديو استطلاع رأي عشوائي قامت به الوزارة، يوضح رغبة بعض الفئات من القطاع غير الرسمي في الحصول على تراخيص مزاولة للنشاط يدعم مبادرة الوزارة.
حضر الاجتماع محمد عبدالرحمن، رئيس الإدارة المركزية للتشغيل بوزارة القوي العاملة، ومصطفى عياده مدير عام الإدارة العامة للعمالة غير المنتظمة، وياسر الشربيني معاون الوزير.

thread.title: La Grieta; The Crack
thread.title_full: La Grieta; The Crack

posts.author: thehumantimes2016
posts.title: La Grieta; The Crack
posts.text:
This collaboration of two Spanish journalists started with an assignment for a series of stories about the EU’s external borders and resulted in an impressive and unusual book, half photo journal, half graphic novel. The authors spent months traveling from Africa to the Arctic where they discovered the complexity of European borders and those working, living and stranded along them. “La Grieta” (The Crack) is, as it says on the first page of the book ‘not a story based on actual events: these are actual events’.
Currently available in Spanish, German, French and Italian and soon, in English.
http://www.lagrieta.info/home

자가용을 태국골프여행패키지 제주도여행패키지상품 이용한 벚꽃길 여행을 많이 관광버스 생각하게 됩니다. 계절별로는 제주여행준비물 국내가족여행 마닐라골프투어 부산에서대마도 겨울철에는 제주카텔 가족여행계획 눈꽃열차 명품해외골프 눈꽃축제 제주관광 여행을 1박2일여행지추천 부모님여행계획 많이 찾고는

thread.title: Crna Gora: Prihod od akciza na cigarete 46,2 miliona evra
thread.title_full: Crna Gora: Prihod od akciza na cigarete 46,2 miliona evra

posts.author: Dragana Eremija
posts.title: Crna Gora: Prihod od akciza na cigarete 46,2 miliona evra
posts.text:
Crna Gora: Prihod od akciza na cigarete 46,2 miliona evra 07. nov. 2017. 10:01 Objavljeno u FINANSIJE 
PODGORICA, Prihod od akciza na cigarete za deset mjeseci ove godine u Crnoj Gori iznosio je 46,2 miliona evra, što je za pet miliona evra ili blizu 12 odsto više nego u istom periodu prošle godine, saopštilo je crnogorsko Ministarstvo finansija. 
“To pokazuje da se avgustovsko povećanje akcizne stope pozitivno odrazilo” , naveli su iz Ministarstva finansija. 
Cigarete su u avgustu poskupjele do 40 centi po paklici, zbog Vladine odluke da poveća akcize na cigarete sa 24 na 30 evra na hiljadu komada. 
Ta akciza važi do kraja godine, nakon čega se povećava na 40 evra na hiljadu komada, što bi po grubim procjenama trebalo da bude poskupljenje do 40, odnosno 50 centi po paklici. 
Iz crnogorskog Ministarstva finansija objasnili su da je od avgusta, kada je počela primjena nove akcizne stope, do kraja oktobra, povećanje prihoda bilo više od 14 odsto. Srna

thread.title: Merck's Consumer Health Leads Debate on Preparing Gen Z for 100 Healthy Years
thread.title_full: Merck's Consumer Health Leads Debate on Preparing Gen Z for 100 Healthy Years

posts.title: Merck's Consumer Health Leads Debate on Preparing Gen Z for 100 Healthy Years
posts.text:
Modifica password Merck's Consumer Health Leads Debate on Preparing Gen Z for 100 Healthy Years The Consumer Health business of Merck, a leading science and technology company, released today a new whitepaper [http://www.merckgroup.com/en/expertise/consumer-health/our-consumer-health-debate/white-paper.html ] entitled "100 Healthy Years - Are Kids Prepared?" aimed at shining light on preparing the young generation for a new era of 100 healthy years. The publication follows the 2017 edition of Merck's Consumer Health "Global Consumer Health Debate", which gathered experts from the UN, UNICEF, UNAIDS, the World Obesity Federation, McKinsey and others to discuss how best to prepare kids for living 100 healthy years. The new whitepaper published today highlights the importance of adopting good health habits early on to ensure any additional years of life expectancy are lived healthy. Germany, ( informazione.it - comunicati stampa - salute e benessere ) 
The Consumer Health business of Merck, a leading science and technology company, released today a new whitepaper [ https://www.merckgroup.com/en/expertise/consumer-health/our-consumer-health-debate/white-paper.html ] entitled "100 Healthy Years - Are Kids Prepared?" aimed at shining light on preparing the young generation for a new era of 100 healthy years. The publication follows the 2017 edition of Merck's Consumer Health "Global Consumer Health Debate", which gathered experts from the UN, UNICEF, UNAIDS, the World Obesity Federation, McKinsey and others to discuss how best to prepare kids for living 100 healthy years. The new whitepaper published today highlights the importance of adopting good health habits early on to ensure any additional years of life expectancy are lived healthy. 
Uta Kemmerich-Keil , CEO and President of Merck's Consumer Health business, explains: "As the number of people aged 60 or above is expected to grow 56% between 2015 and 2030 - from 901 million to 1.4 billion - this whitepaper highlights the importance to focus on today children's health to address society's changing demographic and ensure today's kids approach older age in good health." While life expectancy is increasing worldwide, the 2015 Global Burden of Disease Study reports that non-communicable diseases, such as cardiovascular disease, diabetes, and chronic respiratory disease account for seven out of ten deaths worldwide [1] . In addition, the World Obesity Federation reports that over 223 million school children globally are overweight or obese and that this number is expected to reach 268 million by 2025 [2] . 
This means those additional years of life expectancy could be lived in a disease state, showing the importance of healthy life expectancy as a KPI, i.e. the number of years an individual is expected to live in good health and free of long-term disability. While biological factors play a significant role in determining healthy life expectancy, non-biological factors, such as behavioral, economic, social, environmental, and cultural conditions, can be influenced and are equally important in determining lifelong health. 
To participate in global efforts to address this situation, Merck's Consumer Health new whitepaper advocates for renewed collaboration between the main stakeholders, including educators, parents, policy makers, healthcare practitioners, and NGOs, to develop health education programs for school-aged children taking into account the prospective of living 100 healthy years. With support from research conducted by the Economist Intelligence Unit in five countries, Merck's Consumer Health whitepaper provides a holistic view of the state of play of children's health today. It also takes a deep dive into healthy life expectancy, exploring health education programs in various countries, and providing a roadmap for achieving optimal outcomes for children's health over the long-term. 
The white paper also features a case study of the GEN100 [ TM ] program recently rolled out by Merck's Consumer Health in South Africa , and which aims at raising awareness on the importance of health programs and education in South Africa school's curriculum. Given the country's current health challenges, such as malnutrition, HIV/AIDS, and infectious diseases, it is vital to inform the younger generation to adopt healthy habits early on. The GEN100 [ TM ] program convenes public and private partners, including Merck's Consumer Health and the South African Ministry of Basic Education, to teach children how to live longer and healthier lives. GEN100 [ TM ] is currently operating in more than 40 schools and touches upon nutrition, obesity, diabetes, and physical exercise topics. Key element of this program is quantitative measurement to be able to evaluate the mid- and long-term effects and impact of such educational awareness program. 
The white paper released today is a part of Merck Consumer Health's WE100 ® movement, which aims to help prepare society for a new era of humans living 100 healthy years. WE100 ® is a brand neutral initiative supporting all generations and cultural backgrounds globally. 
About the Consumer Health business of Merck Brands of the Consumer Health business, such as Neurobion ® , Bion ® , Nasivin ® , Seven Seas ® , Dolo-Neurobion ® , and Femibion ® are innovative leaders in key markets, backed by science and trusted by consumers worldwide. The Consumer Health business is with over 3,800 employees globally active in over 40 markets. The portfolio comprises of brands with annual total sales of about $ 1 billion . Consumer Health is a business of the Healthcare business sector within the Merck Group with global headquarters in Darmstadt, Germany . 
For more information please go to https://www.merck-consumer-health.com or https://twitter.com/merck_ch . 
All Merck Press Releases are distributed by e-mail at the same time they become available on the Merck Website. Please go to https://www.merckgroup.com/subscribe to register online, change your selection or discontinue this service. 
About Merck Merck is a leading science and technology company in healthcare, life science and performance materials. Around 50,000 employees work to further develop technologies that improve and enhance life - from biopharmaceutical therapies to treat cancer or multiple sclerosis, cutting-edge systems for scientific research and production, to liquid crystals for smartphones and LCD televisions. In 2016, Merck generated sales of € 15.0 billion in 66 countries. 
Founded in 1668, Merck is the world's oldest pharmaceutical and chemical company. The founding family remains the majority owner of the publicly listed corporate group. Merck holds the global rights to the Merck name and brand. The only exceptions are the United States and Canada , where the company operates as EMD Serono, MilliporeSigma and EMD Performance Materials. 
References: 1. "7 out of 10 people die globally of non-communicable diseases." British Heart Foundation, October 2016 , https://www.bhf.org.uk/news-from-the-bhf/news-archive/2016/october/7-out-of-10-people-die-globally-of-non-communicable-diseases . 2. "World obesity day infographic." World Obesity Federation, 2016, https://www.obesityday.worldobesity.org/infographics . 
Contact: Lars Atorf , +49-6151-856-3114
